android.inputmethodservice
类 InputMethodService.InputMethodImpl

java.lang.Object
  android.inputmethodservice.AbstractInputMethodService.AbstractInputMethodImpl
      android.inputmethodservice.InputMethodService.InputMethodImpl
所有已实现的接口：
InputMethod
包容类：
InputMethodService
public class InputMethodService.InputMethodImpl
extends AbstractInputMethodService.AbstractInputMethodImpl

Concrete implementation of AbstractInputMethodService.AbstractInputMethodImpl that provides all of the standard behavior for an input method.

嵌套类摘要
 
从接口 android.view.inputmethod.InputMethod 继承的嵌套类/接口
InputMethod.SessionCallback

方法摘要
 void attachToken(IBinder token)
          Take care of attaching the given window token provided by the system.

          Handle a request by the system to show the soft input area.

          This method is called when the application starts to receive text and it is ready for this input method to process received events and send result text back to the application.

          Clear the current input binding.

构造方法详细信息

InputMethodService.InputMethodImpl

public InputMethodService.InputMethodImpl()
方法详细信息

attachToken

public void attachToken(IBinder token)
Take care of attaching the given window token provided by the system.

bindInput

public void bindInput(InputBinding binding)
Handle a new input binding, calling InputMethodService.onBindInput() when done.

参数：
binding - Information about the application window that is binding to the input method.
另请参见：
InputBinding, InputMethod.unbindInput()

unbindInput

public void unbindInput()
Clear the current input binding.

startInput

public void startInput(InputConnection ic,
                       EditorInfo attribute)
从接口 InputMethod 复制的描述
This method is called when the application starts to receive text and it is ready for this input method to process received events and send result text back to the application.

参数：
ic - Optional specific input connection for communicating with the text box; if null, you should use the generic bound input connection.
attribute - Information about the text box (typically, an EditText) that requests input.
另请参见：
EditorInfo

restartInput

public void restartInput(InputConnection ic,
                         EditorInfo attribute)
从接口 InputMethod 复制的描述
This method is called when the state of this input method needs to be reset.

Typically, this method is called when the input focus is moved from one text box to another.

参数：
ic - Optional specific input connection for communicating with the text box; if null, you should use the generic bound input connection.
attribute - The attribute of the text box (typically, a EditText) that requests input.
另请参见：
EditorInfo

hideSoftInput

public void hideSoftInput(int flags,
                          ResultReceiver resultReceiver)
Handle a request by the system to hide the soft input area.

参数：
flags - Provides additional information about the show request. Currently always 0.
resultReceiver - The client requesting the show may wish to be told the impact of their request, which should be supplied here. The result code should be InputMethodManager.RESULT_UNCHANGED_SHOWN, InputMethodManager.RESULT_UNCHANGED_HIDDEN, InputMethodManager.RESULT_SHOWN, or InputMethodManager.RESULT_HIDDEN.

showSoftInput

public void showSoftInput(int flags,
                          ResultReceiver resultReceiver)
Handle a request by the system to show the soft input area.

参数：
flags - Provides additional information about the show request. Currently may be 0 or have the bit InputMethod.SHOW_EXPLICIT set.
resultReceiver - The client requesting the show may wish to be told the impact of their request, which should be supplied here. The result code should be InputMethodManager.RESULT_UNCHANGED_SHOWN, InputMethodManager.RESULT_UNCHANGED_HIDDEN, InputMethodManager.RESULT_SHOWN, or InputMethodManager.RESULT_HIDDEN.
